TopicTitle: Kerbnese Space Agency- Mods please close

Articles.Content:
This is my personal thread in support of the space race on this thread:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/135513-Space-Race

I will post technical specifications and general talk about my missions. Current missions include:

Unmanned: Artimus 1, Artimus 2, Seer 1, Seer TS

Manned: Falcon 1

Failed: Seer 2

Artimus 1,2 and Seer 1 pictures: http://imgur.com/a/gKH38

Seer TS and Falcon 1 pics: http://imgur.com/a/Vz89g

If you have a probe you want to send up, post a craft file!! I'll do commercial missions!!

- - - Updated - - -
